sentence.Network_en: In our pursuit of good health and shapeliness, most of us think immediately of dieting.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了拥有健康身体和苗条身材, 我们大多数人都会马上想到节食.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of having a well-rounded body

auth_sentence.content: Obviously, we were all there for Prince William and Catherine, but I was struck by the elegance and shapeliness of Pippa's dress.
